          <title>
            <string language="fr">Lumière fléchissante</string>
            <string language="en">Fainting light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In Ohnmacht fallendes Licht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz desmaiando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce di svenimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως λιποθυμίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz que se desmaya</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière devient plus faible au fur et à mesure qu'elle s'éloigne de la source.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light gets fainter as it gets further away from the source.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Allumez</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht erhält, es 
weiter entfernt von die Quelle so schwächer auch erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz começa por 
mais mais fraca que comece mais adicional afastado da fonte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce ottiene 
per quanto ottenga più debole più lontano dalla sorgente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φως παίρνει πιό 
εξασθενημένο όπως παίρνει πιό μακρυά από την πηγή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz consigue tan
más débil que consigue más futura lejos de la fuente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
